title: Alterio Motives Award Fund
description: To provide support for undergraduate students enrolled in Theatre & Dance at the University, with emphasis on students in the dance program.  If $25,000 is raised within five years, the fund will be administered as a permanent endowment.
marketingContent: Preference will be given to students demonstrating a commitment to the LGBTQIA+ Community and/or contributing to the advancement of LGBTQIA+ equality.
